colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 481

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would help finance:
            (a) the construction and reconstruction of the 486 km La
            Oroya-Aguaytia road; (b) the employment of consultants to
            continue to render advisory services in the administration
            of the Highway Department; (c) the preparation of further
            road studies.
